titleStmt.title: The word of the Lord to all the inhabitants in England from the highest to the lowest, that they may know his determination, and so be entreated to break off from their sin, in true obedience unto him, that they may escape in the day of his dreadful appearance when no flesh shall stand before him / William Dewsbery.
titleStmt.author: Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
